publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1992 Mr Jim Wallace: Police and Fire Services (Finance) Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Police and Fire Services (Finance) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Angus MacKay*, Iain Gray*
